entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
